name: FreeHand 4 Drawing File
summary: Learn about .FH4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FreeHand was originally developed by Macromedia, acquired by Adobe, then phased out in 2007.
NOTE: You can open FH4 files in FreeHand 8 by using a Mac OS Classic emulator. The file can then be saved as a .FH8 file, which can be opened by the programs below.

description: Image file created by FreeHand, a vector image drawing application; contains a FreeHand version 4 drawing; uses lines, points, and curves to create images that can be scaled with no loss of quality; similar to .FH3, .FH5, and .FH6 files created by FreeHand.
